$interpreted: Dagger: Take the injured bears back first! I'll bring up the rear!
Teenage Bear: Understood.
Dagger: No human's setting foot in Totemtaff!
Crushfang: Hold it!
Crushfang: Dylan, fancy seeing you here.
Dylan: It has been a while, Crushfang. Seems like just yesterday that we agreed on an armistice.
Dylan: So, why are we meeting on the battlefield again?
Dagger: It's you humans' fault for trespassing on our land!
Dylan: The Sunshine Infantry has long abandoned mining in bear territory. Your trespassers are not from my ranks.
Dagger: Who knows if those miners aren't your men in disguise!
Dylan: Do you have any evidence of this?
Dagger: I...
Dylan: Crushfang, how are we going to settle this issue?
Crushfang: Dispatching troops against your Infantry without proof was indeed our mistake.
Dylan: If so, an eye for an eye. I will let this slide in exchange for this bear's life.

Crushfang: No! A bear's mistake is my responsibility. 
Let Dagger go before things get ugly!

Dylan: Why should I let our main culprit off the hook!?
Hand him over!
Crushfang: Over my dead body!
Soldier: Colonel Levon!

Dylan: Who shot that arrow!?
I've not given the order to attack!
Dagger: You despicable rat!
Crushfang: Halt!

Crushfang: Bless this arrow, it calmed me down... 
This eye shall be my price for the damage inflicted on the Sunshine Infantry.
Dylan: We're even... but if this happens again, I won't let you off so easily.
Crushfang: Dylan, look at the land you stand on.
Crushfang: Totemtaff is not only our sanctuary; it is our pride. I will not allow any person with malicious intent to set foot on this land.

Crushfang: As long as humans do not disturb Totemtaff, 
we have no reason for war.
Dylan: Patch up the captured bear warriors. Once they are treated, escort them back to Totemtaff.
Dylan: Let's go.
Dylan: You bears... you have an incredible Chieftain! Don't forget that.

Dagger: Chewed out Furygrowl, now it must be my turn...
Well, go ahead!

Crushfang: Killing enemies on the battlefield, thrilling isn't it? 
But what about the casualties of your fellow bears?
Dagger: ......
Crushfang: I was once young and impulsive. It cost me a friendâ€”your father. You are an orphan because of me.

Crushfang: From that moment on, I learned to be calm. 
I vowed myself to never lose anyone of you ever again.
Dagger: Chieftain.
Crushfang: What?

Dagger: Thank you.
And... I'm sorry.
Crushfang: Hmph. Get some rest.
